departments.description: Lists all departments in the organization, usually including a department ID and department name.

employees.description: Contains details about each employee, such as employee ID, birth date, first name, last name, gender, and hire date.

salaries.description: Stores salary information for each employee, including employee ID, salary amount, and the dates for which each salary is valid.

titles.description: Holds the job titles of employees, including employee ID, title name, and the dates during which each title is held.

dept_emp.description: A junction table that shows which department each employee belongs to, including dates of association.

dept_manager.description: Indicates which employees are managers of departments, along with the respective dates of their management terms.
